description: Docker monitoring with Prometheus and cAdvisor

targets.expr: ((container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{image!="", image!~".*cadvisor", job="$cluster"} == 0) + on (instance) group_left(image) (machine_memory_bytes{job="$cluster"})) OR (container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{image!="", image!~".*cadvisor", job="$cluster"} > 0)

title: Docker Swarm Monitoring
